content.text:
# 2024 President's Cup – Men's singles

Dimitar Kuzmanov
| runner   =  Saba Purtseladze
| score    = 6–4, 6–3
| edition  =
}}
Denis Yevseyev was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title.
Dimitar Kuzmanov won the title after defeating Saba Purtseladze 6–4, 6–3 in the final.
Seeds
Ričardas Berankis (first round)
#  Khumoyun Sultanov (first round)
#  Dimitar Kuzmanov (champion)
#  Yshai Oliel (first round)
#  Evgeny Donskoy (quarterfinals)
#  Yankı Erel (second round, retired)
#  Evgeny Karlovskiy (semifinals)
#  Dominik Palán (first round)
}}
